title: Are there any nerfs / reworks coming to rumble?
body: Hey. After trying rumble I'm intrested in maining him but I'm a bit concerned about reworks or nerfs. Does anyone know if these are coming his way? Thanks!

replies.body: You should be safe, but i dont know for sure. They generally base nerfs on if a champion is doing to well and rumble seems in a decent position atm.
